# 2.3. Installation steps {.unnumbered}

## 2.3.1. Getting started with Pi

### Step 1: Install the Raspberry Pi's OS on your SD card {-}
Plug in your SD card on your laptop. Open the [Raspberry OS Imager](https://www.raspberrypi.com/software/) and `format` your SD card before the installation.
